name: DieToWin
description:
Welcome to the Dungeon

Die to Win if you can find out an escape of the dungeon you will be rewarded, keep in mind who you are weak against. 

Find the keys open all the doors and escape.

The Green Speed Knight  is instantly killed by Slime 
The Slime is instantly killed by Attack Knight

The Red Attack Knight is instantly killed by Mushroom 
The Mushroom   is instantly killed by Defense Knight

You Can Have A Lot of  Speed

You Can Have A Lot of  Defense

You Can Have A Lot of  Attack

You Can Have A Lot of  Nothing
